45.eng-name: The Book of Virtue, Enjoining Good Manners, and Joining of the Ties of Kinship

hadiths.text: Nu'man b. Bashir reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:The similitude of believers in regard to mutual love, affection, fellow-feeling is that of one body; when any limb of it aches, the whole body aches, because of sleeplessness and fever

chapter.eng-name: The Mutual Mercy, Compassion And Support Of The Believers
